  • 使用ClassConfOption的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.giraph.conf
    Package of Giraph configuration related things.

    • org.apache.giraph.conf中ClassConfOption的使用

      声明为ClassConfOption的org.apache.giraph.conf中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ClassConfOption<AggregatorWriter> GiraphConstants.AGGREGATOR_WRITER_CLASS
      AggregatorWriter class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<EdgeInputFormat> GiraphConstants.EDGE_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS
      EdgeInputFormat class
      static ClassConfOption<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> GiraphConstants.EDGE_VALUE_CLASS
      Edge value class
      static ClassConfOption<GraphPartitionerFactory> GiraphConstants.GRAPH_PARTITIONER_FACTORY_CLASS
      Graph partitioner factory class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<OutEdges> GiraphConstants.INPUT_VERTEX_EDGES_CLASS
      Vertex edges class to be used during edge input only - optional
      static ClassConfOption<GiraphJobObserver> GiraphConstants.JOB_OBSERVER_CLASS
      Observer class to watch over job status - optional
      static ClassConfOption<MasterCompute> GiraphConstants.MASTER_COMPUTE_CLASS
      Class for Master - optional
      static ClassConfOption<MasterObserver> GiraphConstants.MASTER_OBSERVER_CLASSES
      Classes for Master Observer - optional
      static ClassConfOption<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> GiraphConstants.MESSAGE_VALUE_CLASS
      Message value class
      static ClassConfOption<Partition> GiraphConstants.PARTITION_CLASS
      Partition class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<PartitionContext> GiraphConstants.PARTITION_CONTEXT_CLASS
      Partition context class
      static ClassConfOption<Vertex> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_CLASS
      Vertex class - required
      static ClassConfOption<Combiner> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_COMBINER_CLASS
      Vertex combiner class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<OutEdges> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_EDGES_CLASS
      Vertex edges class - optional

      Vertex index class
      static ClassConfOption<VertexInputFormat> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS
      VertexInputFormat class
      static ClassConfOption<VertexOutputFormat> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_OUTPUT_FORMAT_CLASS
      VertexOutputFormat class
      static ClassConfOption<VertexResolver> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_RESOLVER_CLASS
      Vertex resolver class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_VALUE_CLASS
      Vertex value class
      static ClassConfOption<VertexValueFactory> GiraphConstants.VERTEX_VALUE_FACTORY_CLASS
      Vertex value factory class - optional
      static ClassConfOption<WorkerContext> GiraphConstants.WORKER_CONTEXT_CLASS
      Worker context class
      static ClassConfOption<WorkerObserver> GiraphConstants.WORKER_OBSERVER_CLASSES
      Classes for Worker Observer - optional
